name: Project TBLM
description:
Project TBLM

TBLM is a racing game that has a different concept from other racing games.

Here all the imagination, stories and mechanics will be made different from other games, the uniqueness that we have will create an amazing playing atmosphere.

Right now we are still in the first prototype stage, but we will continue to fight until the game project is finished

Please make a donation to us to support this ambitious project.

Thank you
Cleverhype Motionworks
